item.title: React Native on Heroku
item.description: As a web developer doing iOS development with react native, I need a staging environment for the product manager to review changes to the app. On the web, that means using Heroku, but with a react native app it is a bit more complicated. My react native app has two components, the packager (for serving the client code) and the server (for interacting with the app). Heroku only lets one process bind to an external port, so it wasn’t easy to do without creating two heroku apps.
